div.div: Q 10 values for various SOM components in the topsoil and subsoil.
div.p: ( A) Q 10 for bulk soil, active pool, and slow pool. ( B) Q 10 for three cumulative respired soil C fractions. The ends of the boxes represent the 25th and 75th percentiles. The horizontal lines inside each box and the whiskers show the median and the SD, respectively ( n = 9). * P < 0.05, significant difference between the topsoil and the subsoil; ns, no significant difference.
